name: Sword Saint
description:
Warriors first engage in mental combat before the physical melee begins.  In these moments, they plan to defeat their opponent.  When the battle begins, they act on instinct: without thought.

Defeat your opponent:

  • Play cards to move to their position, and attack them.
  • When a card has a movement action and attack action, the movement action is resolved first.
  • Any attack that hits will defeat your opponent... or you!  Plan you approach.
  • Defeat your opponent as many times as possible within 20 seconds.
  • Additional points are awarded for:
    • Turning off your 'Ghost' - this shows you where you will be after each play.
    • Turning off your opponents 'Ghost' - same, but for your opponent.
    • Hitting your opponent with your first attack card.
Controls:
  • Mouse Controls
    • General
      • Esc - Options (in game only)
      • Mouse Click (or touch event) - 
        • On Card - Play card
        • On 'Ghost' Button - Remove player or enemy ghost. (for higher score)
        • On 'Done' Button - Play out cards ASAP. (when you're sure you've defeated enemy and want to play out cards quickly)
